task.summary: Revamped the Project. Now all Encoding Schemes inter-transliterable.
Adding Path for JAR File for Download Link for End Users
Encoding Panel modified to accept IPA
Added Gradle Task for running Conversion Tasks from Console
Streamlined logic to convert between various encodings, now lakhs of characters can be converted without memory failure.

MESSAGE.value: Revamped the Project. Now all Encoding Schemes inter-transliterable.
Adding Path for JAR File for Download Link for End Users
Encoding Panel modified to accept IPA
Added Gradle Task for running Conversion Tasks from Console
Streamlined logic to convert between various encodings, now lakhs of characters can be converted without memory failure.
